title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Hong_Kong_3D_Museum
transformers_text: Hong Kong 3 D Museum Chinese 3 D is a privately owned art museum on Granville Road Hong Kong Specializing in trompe l ' il it opened on 7 July 2014 1 It features art created by local artists that focuses on local culture and views of the city and provides instructions to help visitors view and photograph the optical illusions 2 It was inspired by the Trick eye Museum in Seoul and similar museums in other Asian countries 3 4 In April 2015 it hosted the first 3 D exhibition on the manga series One Piece which 5 was criticized as prone to continuity errors but otherwise well received 6 7 In May 2015 a subsidiary gallery of the museum was opened in Ponte 16 Macau 8 22 23 48 N 113 58 11 E 22 39674 N 113 96970 E 22 39674 113 96970 This article related to a museum in Hong Kong is a stub You can help Wikipedia by expanding it
